pkgmetadata.longdescription: Association Measurement Through Sliced Independence Test (SIT) // Computes the sit coefficient between two vectors x and y, possibly all paired coefficients for a matrix. The reference for the methods implemented here is Zhang, Yilin, Canyi Chen, and Liping Zhu. 2022. "Sliced Independence Test." Statistica Sinica. doi:10.5705/ss.202021.0203. This package incorporates the Galton peas example.
